overview: The M'era Luna is a festival of goth, metal and industrial music. It is held annually on the second weekend of every August, in Hildesheim, Germany at Flugplatz Hildesheim-Drispenstedt, a former British Army airbase.  The M'era Luna includes camping facilities and has two stages: a large rock festival style structure, erected for the show each year, and a former aircraft hangar. There have been some complaints about the acoustics in the hangar venue.[1] It also features DJ sets on Friday and Saturday evening.  Tracklist :  01. Apocalyptica - Bring Them To Light  02. Klutæ	- Slippery When Dead  03. Tanzwut - Lügner  04. Omnia - Etrezomp-Ni Kelted  05. Project Pitchfork - Conjure  06. Mono Inc. - Voices Of Doom  07. Tiamat - Cold Seed  08. ASP - Wechselbalg  09. Hurts - Blood, Tears & Gold  10. Within Temptation - Shot In The Dark  + Interviews
title: M'era Luna Festival 2011
